bioAsHtml: Independent software engineer working on data engineering, distributed computing and machine learning related projects. I co-organize the Paris Datageek Meetup, and regularly speak on big data and distributed systems.

acceptedTalks.track: Big Data, Machine Learning, IA & Analytics
